name.description: The name that appears on the contact information page, e.g. Contact Us.

title.description: The name of the contact information page, that appears on the browser tab.

navigationCaption.description: The name of the contact information page that appears in the navigation bar.

shortDescription.description: Additional short information that can be given to e.g. better explain what's on the contact information page.

description.description: Additional information that can be added to the contact information page, e.g. tax identification number or bank account.

contactPerson.description: The contact person for the shop, usually the shop owner.

contactPersonJobTitle.description: The job title of the contact person.

address.description: The postal address of the shop.

phone.description: The phone number of the shop.

email.description: The email address of the shop.
